name: Secret Agent (itch)
description:
SINGLE PLAYER - PUZZLE SHOOTER

Try to gather as much intelligence as you can by destroying asteroids, each piece of intelligence will reveal a part of your mission.

Made for trijam #205 on theme : Secret Mission, it took 2 hours and 56 minute.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

- Control your spaceship with the position of your mouse.

- Click Left to shoot, right to use a freezing ammo

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks for playing ! 

If you had fun, don't forget to comment your feedbacks and add to your collection !
